idea-plugin.name: Swiss Ephemeris
idea-plugin.description:
Provides IDE support for the Swiss Ephemeris PHP extension.
The Swiss Ephemeris PHP extension can be found here: https://github.com/cyjoelchen/php-sweph
idea-plugin.change-notes:
0.3

  • Updated swe_set_ephe_path() method stub.

0.2

  • Added SE constants.

0.1

  • Initial support of extension tagged @ 4.0.5.
